char RODOS::LinkinterfaceUART::getcharWaiting ( ) [private]
bool RODOS::LinkinterfaceUART::getNetworkMsg ( NetworkMessage &  inMsg,
int32_t &  numberOfReceivedBytes 
) [virtual]

Processs all received Data. When a NetworkMessage is complete it returns true

Parameters:
inMsgNetworkMessage to write to. When return false this may contain incomplete Data, so do not touch it
numberOfReceivedBytesWhen return=true this contains the number of Bytes really received or -1 if it is unknown. Should be ==Networkmessage.numberOfBytesToSend() in case of no error.

Reimplemented from RODOS::Linkinterface.

void RODOS::LinkinterfaceUART::init ( void  ) [virtual]

To initialize the hardware and to establish physical interfaces. Depending on the type of interface set interrupt handlers (UART) or select a port (UDP) and init the local node number if possible.

Reimplemented from RODOS::Linkinterface.

bool RODOS::LinkinterfaceUART::isNetworkMsgSent ( ) [virtual]

Returns if all buffered Messages have been transmittet on the wire. If this returns true the next call to sendNetworkMsg should immetiatly start sending out the new messages.

Reimplemented from RODOS::Linkinterface.

bool RODOS::LinkinterfaceUART::sendNetworkMsg ( NetworkMessage &  outgoingMessage) [virtual]

Sends NetworkMessage over the Link. May block. When it returns the Message should be send out or have been buffered.

Parameters:
TheMessage to send
